com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.pipeline.jersey

Class ClientConfigSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.pipeline.jersey.ClientConfigSettings

  • public class ClientConfigSettings
extends Object
    Class used for injecting settings into the various places that need it.

                            Object readTimeout,

        Construct a ClientConfigSettings object wit the given settings.
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - Connection timeout in milliseconds
        readTimeout - read timeout in milliseconds
        shouldLog - if true, add logging filter to clients.
